Plot: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an Interpol agent.
Title: Lord of War
Actors: Nicolas Cage, Bridget Moynahan, Jared Leto, Shake Tukhmanyan
tomatoConsensus: While Lord of War is an intelligent examination of the gun trade, it is too scattershot in its plotting to connect.
Language: German, Arabic, Russian, Ukrainian, English, French, Spanish, Turkish
